summary: It really tickles my mind how everyone wants Show!ARYA to kill show!Cersei. I am so tired of seeing people treat show!arya like...
body: It really tickles my mind how everyone wants Show!ARYA to kill show!Cersei. I am so tired of seeing people treat show!arya like she the only person who has killed people. Damn a lot of other main characters actually killed more than her but people are putting their wish fulfillment on her. And show!Arya killing show!Cersei really does not make sense in the long run. Show!Jaime doing it or show!Tyrion makes a lot more sense, but that is just my opinion.

tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary:
❝The life we deserve to live❞ The blood runs down my chin because my
lip has been broken by a slap, the air brushes my back...
body:
❝The life we deserve to live❞

The blood runs down my chin because my lip has been broken by a slap, the air brushes my back because my dress has been torn by a tug. He’s humiliating me in front of the whole court, but I hold back my tears.

I shut my eyelids. I try to recall the memories of when life was kind, good and sweet with me and you.

You’re there. You’re combing my hair, playing with my auburn hair and then kissing my forehead. You’re protecting me.

We deserve another life to meet and love each other again, where neither pain, fear nor blood exists.

To find peace together. 

—— Sansa & Jeyne aesthetic |  © caption by me.

The Drabble is readable here on AO3.

summary:
I can't wait to see how Arya reacts to...
Being asked to bow down to Daenerys
On the one hand, she doesn't care about sitting on...
body:
I can’t wait to see how Arya reacts to…

Being asked to bow down to Daenerys

On the one hand, she doesn’t care about sitting on any throne. On the other, with half of her family dead, she’s beginning to grasp the importance of the few remaining Starks holding Winterfell. She might not care about titles, but she is a proud Northener. Ned and her years South have made her such. I wonder how she’d feel giving up the North to a foreigner. Her conversation with Tywin shows she has a positive view of Aegon’s sisters. But she was a child then and the Targaryens were just a tale. Now she’ll have to come face to face with one.

Finally seeing Jon again

Arya loves Jon the most of all her siblings. Their goodbye in the beginning of the story shows just how special they are to each other. But with both of them having grown and suffered, with Jon having been killed once and Arya having killed many times, they’re different people now. I wonder if the dynamics between them could change. On the one hand, all pain was forgotten when Jon and Sansa met again, and I saw Arya being her lighthearted self with Brienne. But on the other, they are all in a much darker place now, and there might be no time for more than just a quick hug and a short smile.

Meeting Gendry once more

He kept her dangerous secret safe. He’s someone whose life she saved. They ran together, were captured together, escaped together. On the one hand, she considered him family. On the other, he told her he didn’t feel the same. Even so she resents Melisandre for having taken him away. But even if Melisandre didn’t, she knows he would’ve left her anyway. Does Arya unknowingly hold a grudge? Did her reunion with “Jaqen” remove Gendry from whatever place he once held in her heart? How will Gendry’s friendship with Jon affect the way he sees her? How will it affect the way she sees him?

I guess Season 8 to me is less “What will happen to everyone?” and more “How will Arya deal with everyone?”.

I hope she somehow gets to kill my other favorite, Cersei. But before she does, I hope they get to know each other just a tiny bit better.

summary: So I just finished watching Game of Thrones s6 and all I could think during the Riverrun Seige was how broken and sad Jamie...
body: So I just finished watching Game of Thrones s6 and all I could think during the Riverrun Seige was how broken and sad Jamie Lannister is. He tries to give his word, both to Blackfish and Edmure Tully and is scoffed at, because who would trust a man who kills his own king, the king he swore to protect? Then we have Brienne of Tarth who demands that Jamie give his word to her, because she trusts him to not betray her. That moment must’ve been so profound for Jamie - to know that there is someone in the world, who is not related to him by blood, who does not fear his power or money, but still believes in him, probably more than anyone. That there is someone in this world who admires and respects him for the person he is.

summary: Ultimi sei episodi de “Il Trono di Spade”: la fine di un’era e le sue conseguenze
title: Ultimi sei episodi de “Il Trono di Spade”: la fine di un’era e le sue conseguenze
body:
Dopo sette stagioni di successo, ad aprile verrà trasmessa quella conclusiva del “Trono di Spade”: la fine di una serie TV dal successo planetario porta sempre malinconia ma anche nuove prospettive, sia per gli attori che per i fan. Scopriamole insieme… #got #gameofthrones #tronodispade #nospoiler

La fine del “Trono di Spade” è in arrivo: le dichiarazioni degli attori

Il 14 aprile 2019 è una data temuta e al tempo stesso attesa da tutti i fan della celeberrima…

tags: see what i did there lol
how am i already on season 5
summary: so i started Game of Thrones last week
body:
so i started Game of Thrones last week

it was one of those shows i had on my list and always said i would get to.. i’m already on season FIVE. why did nobody tell me aquaman was in this shit? i would’ve started it wayy sooner lol #LongLiveDrogo. i also applaud the amount of character development in the show, especially in Kingslayer and Tyrion. Furthermore, my weak stomach hasn’t gotten any better and i still have to look away when ppl are getting stabbed and beheaded 🤢🤮 they need to chill out with that.


this show is consuming my life and i blame you all.

thanks for coming to my ned talk.

Furthermore, my weak stomach hasn’t gotten any better and i still have to look away when ppl are getting stabbed and beheaded 🤢🤮 they need to chill out with that.


this show is consuming my life and i blame you all.

thanks for coming to my ned talk.

trail.content_raw:
so i started Game of Thrones last week

it was one of those shows i had on my list and always said i would get to.. i’m already on season FIVE. why did nobody tell me aquaman was in this shit? i would’ve started it wayy sooner lol #LongLiveDrogo. i also applaud the amount of character development in the show, especially in Kingslayer and Tyrion. Furthermore, my weak stomach hasn’t gotten any better and i still have to look away when ppl are getting stabbed and beheaded 🤢🤮 they need to chill out with that.


this show is consuming my life and i blame you all.

thanks for coming to my ned talk.
